title: Cocoa Puffs vintage typeface
content:
Does someone know the name of the font used in this vintage cocoa puffs type-logo?  
Thanks a bunch.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puffs_5101.jpg)

Font: 

 Cocoa Puffs vintage
author: dterik

comments.content: It's the old 70's packaging of cocoa puffs cereal

Nothing perfectly matching but some very close: [British Inserat MN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/british-inserat), [Wagner Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/wagner-grotesk), [Smart Sans MTI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/smart-sans), [Xheighter TA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/xheighter-condensed), [Helvetica Ultra Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica), [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/compacta), [Fusion Sans PF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-fusion-sans-pro), [Plakette](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/plakette) (~Inserat), [Sorren Ex](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/sorren-ex)
